sqlMap.statement:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS PCW_COUNT FROM PRC_CUST_AUDC_WRK PCW WHERE PCW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PCW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #upldCsvRqstPk# AND PCW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND PCW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_CMNT_TXT IS NULL

SELECT PCW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM ,PCW.PRC_CATG_NM ,PCW.DS_ACCT_NUM ,PCW.DS_ACCT_NM ,PCW.REQ_FLG ,PCW.EFF_FROM_DT ,PCW.EFF_THRU_DT ,PCW.DEF_PRC_LIST_FLG FROM PRC_CUST_AUDC_WRK PCW WHERE PCW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND PCW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_PK = #upldCsvRqstPk# AND PCW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND PCW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_CMNT_TXT IS NULL
ORDER BY PCW.UPLD_CSV_RQST_ROW_NUM
